titles.title: Innovative Cognitive Care for Veterans Act of 2023
Innovative Cognitive Care for Veterans Act of 2023
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a pilot program for the cognitive care of veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Innovative Cognitive Care for Veterans Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to implement, as part of the Veterans Community Care Program, a five-year pilot program under which the VA may enter into agreements with certain entities to provide telehealth, virtual training tools for home health aides, and other services that slow the progression of cognitive disorders.
